channel.title: Plainview Texas on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Plainview Texas on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: PCA Texas peanut factory - the former Jimmy Dean Meat sausage factory - in Plainview, TX closed
item.description: If you have a kid who eats peanut butter, you've been listening to news of the peanut recalls.  And when your eight year old furrows his brow when you go shopping together and is concerned about salmonella in his peanuts, you're concerned too. The latest bit of this story is the closing of the PCA plant in Plainview, TX.  I was able to grab some old news stories about the opening of the plant, and to compare those with the stories that are running now.
